Package client.model

Class ClientServerConnection

java.lang.Object
client.model.ClientServerConnection
public class ClientServerConnection extends Object
The ClientServerConnection class handles the client's connection to the server, sending and receiving data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientServerConnection(ControllerClient controller, String ip, int port)
    Constructor that prepares the connection between server and client.

    Method
    Description

    Connects the user to the server.

    Disconnects the client/user from the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientServerConnection

      public ClientServerConnection(ControllerClient controller, String ip, int port)
      Constructor that prepares the connection between server and client.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller object.
      ip - The IP address of the server.
      port - The port number of the server.

  • Method Details

    • connectUser

      public boolean connectUser(User user)
      Connects the user to the server.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object representing the logged-in user.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is successful, false otherwise.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects the client/user from the server.

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(Message message)
      Adds a message-object to the message buffer to be sent to the server.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message object to be sent.
